mapper.select: SELECT no,poster,title,num FROM (SELECT no,poster,title,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,poster,title FROM daum_movie WHERE cateno=#{cateno} ORDER BY score DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12.0) FROM daum_movie WHERE cateno = #{cateno}
